claim_card.claim: A universal preprocessing recipe is specified: acquire field snapshots, band-pass to an inertial/coherence range using k-IR and k-UV bounds, then compute local gradient amplitude Δ(x,t)=||∇F|| and its spatial mean Δ̄(t).
claim_card.test_hook: Run the preprocessing exactly as written; verify Δ̄(t) stability under small changes to band-pass bounds and resolution η.
